archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Configuration Specification Management
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Define, modify, and remove a configuration specification that defines how an entity, such as a product, service, or resource functions.

properties.value: Configuration Specification Management defines, modifies, and removes a configuration specification that defines how an entity, such as a product, service, or resource functions. A configuration specification can be associated with a policy that determines if the specification should be used, contains parameters that represent the details of how an entity functions, constraints that can be used to select the value of a parameter, as well as relationships that a configuration specification has with one or more other configuration specifications.
